      • delete

        public FileList delete(UserIdentity authenticatedUser,
                       long[] fileIds)
        Parameters:
        authenticatedUser -
        fileIds - if null or empty, all files for the given user will be deleted
        Returns:

      • getFiles

        public FileList getFiles(UserIdentity authenticatedUser,
                         long[] fileIds,
                         Limits limits)
        Parameters:
        authenticatedUser -
        fileIds - if null or empty, or users files will be returned
        limits - optional limits parameter, if missing, all files will be returned
        Returns:
        list of files or null if none found
